column6: "The Damnation Dilemma" - The Surfer finds himself drawn to the most "unlikely planet" he's ever sensed in all his cosmic travels. A population of 666 billion sentient beings... made up of 666.667 billion races. What is the secret of the world where practically no two lifeforms are the same? - And while Norrin Radd deals with this mystery, Dawn Greenwood comes face-to-face with "The Greatest Monster In The Galaxy!"
